what: hercpanorama: Wrangle data from the Panorama Student Information System — hercpanorama-package
title: hercpanorama: Wrangle data from the Panorama Student Information System — hercpanorama-package
text: Student-level data Panoram export wide-formatted csv files. file common identifying demographic data, many, possibly unique, columns corresponding scores assessments responses surveys. names columns include information type data collected well data collected. also usually two columns every assessment, raw score grade.

title: hercpanorama: Wrangle data from the Panorama Student Information System — hercpanorama-package
text: Maintainer: Ben Taft ben.taft@career2cradle.org contributors: Higher Expectations Racine County [copyright holder]

title: Extract text from a csv-formatted student-level file output from Panorama — import_raw_report
Extract text from a csv-formatted student-level file output from Panorama — import_raw_report
text: .filename <chr> full path file

title: Extract text from a csv-formatted student-level file output from Panorama — import_raw_report
text: object class tbl_df, tbl, data.frame least 10 columns Student Student Number <int> student's unique ID Student First Name <chr> student's given name Student Last Name <chr> student's family name Gender <chr> female male 504 Status <chr> whether student personal learning plan ELL Status <chr> whether student learning English additional language Grade Level <chr> grade student . Date Birth <date> students' birthdays seem appear later data sets Race Ethnicity <chr> one OMB '97 race/ethnicites Special ED Status <chr> whethe student participates special education services
